snippet.title: Black Skylands - Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Skylands launches fully on all platforms in Summer 2023!

Follow the story of a young, brave pilot named Eva and her trusty moth, Luma. Captain your airship, gather resources and build weapons as you face off against enemy pirates and the unknown dangers hidden in the clouds.

This steampunk adventure game is soaring out of Early Access soon, having received four major updates enhancing player experience, while also expanding the game's story.


Join the Black Skylands community:

Discord: https://discord.gg/blackskylands
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlackSkylands
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blackskylands
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blackskylands/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BlackSkylands/
Official website: https://www.blackskylands.com/

#blackskylands #indiegame #pixelart #openworld #steampunk #RPG #tinyBuild
